message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering its value to me.
